name: 趙莊敏
objective: 本課程之目的在使同學對財務管理之專業知識產生一概略的認識，期望同學能瞭解資金之運用、籌措及管理之一些觀念及技巧，並做為未來進行相關財務決策或進一步研究財務理論之基礎。本課程會將攸關財務的主題加以介紹,包含：1.財務報表分析2.時間價值，債券與股票3.投資決策與折現分析4.風險、報酬與資金成本5.公司融資政策6.資本結構與股利政策7.財務規畫8.合併與購併9.風險管理
schedule:
週次　　授  課  內  容  要  項
1 Introduction
2 The Corporation and the Financial Manager
3 Functions of Financial Markets and Intermediaries
4 Cost of Capital
5 Accounting - Balance Sheet, Income Statement, Statement of Cash Flows
6 Accounting Practice and Malpractice
7 Time Value of Money -Future Values and NPV
8 Time Value of Money -Perpetuities and Annuities
9 Midterm Exam
10 Valuing Bonds -Interest Rate and Bond Prices, YTM
11 Valuing Bonds -Bond Rates of Return, Default Risk, Yield Curve
12 Valuing Stocks -Book Values, Liquidation Values, and Market Values
13 Valuing Stocks -Dividend Discount Model, Growth Stocks vs. Income Stocks
14 Market Anomalies and Behavioral Finance
15 Net Present Value
16 Other Investment Criteria
17 Mutually Exclusive Projects and Capital Rationing
18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
平時20%(讀書心得報告及課堂練習)
期中考試40%
期末考試40%
materials: Brealey, Myers, and Marcus, “Fundamentals of Corporate Finance”，華泰文化事業公司代理
